cu.explanation_en: Setting SCTP_OUTSTREAMS to 0 will cause SCTP connection failures as stream counts must be positive integers.

du.explanation_en: Setting preambleReceivedTargetPower to 100 exceeds the valid power range for PRACH preamble, causing RACH configuration errors.
du.explanation_zh: 將 preambleReceivedTargetPower 設定為 100 超過 PRACH 前導碼的有效功率範圍，會導致 RACH 配置錯誤。
